ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( (Role_Type_Roll_Up__c = "Customer") && (((ISCHANGED(Name) || ISCHANGED(ABN__c) || ISCHANGED(ParentId) || ISCHANGED(Industry_Sector__c) || ISCHANGED(ACN__c) || ISCHANGED(Organisation_Trading_Name__c) || ISCHANGED(Type)) && ($Profile.Name != "Customer Team" && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'Customer Team Super Users' && $Profile.Name != 'Marketing Super Users' && $Profile.Name != 'Enterprise Onboarding')) || (( ISCHANGED(BillingStreet) || ISCHANGED(BillingCity) || ISCHANGED(BillingState) || ISCHANGED(BillingPostalCode) || ISCHANGED(Billing_DPID__c) || ISCHANGED(DUNS_Number__c) || ISCHANGED(Shipping_DPID__c) || ISCHANGED(ShippingStreet) || ISCHANGED(ShippingCity) || ISCHANGED(ShippingState) || ISCHANGED(ShippingPostalCode) || ISCHANGED(ShippingCountry)) && (($Profile.Name != "Customer Team" && $Profile.Name != 'System Administrator' && $Profile.Name != 'Customer Team Super Users' && $Profile.Name != 'Marketing Super Users' && $Profile.Name != 'Enterprise Onboarding')&& NOT(Owner.IsCurrentUser__c && ($Profile.Name ='BG Base' || $Profile.Name ='Hub Users') )))) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please raise a case record to the Data Quality Management team to change Customers Organisation core details.
